abstract: What can small businesses expect from big banks?
snippet: What can small businesses expect from big banks?
lead_paragraph: Today, we’re publishing an interview The Agenda conducted with Wells Fargo’s two top executives for small-business lending, Marc Bernstein and Doug Case. Small-business owners have criticized big banks — and Wells Fargo is among the biggest — for doing little to help them through the most difficult days of the recent recession, but Mr. Bernstein and Mr. Case were resolute. Whatever the merit of the complaints against the banking industry, the officials said, the complaints were misdirected when it came to Wells Fargo.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Bankers Will Take Your Questions
